item.title: How to Save Tax in India
item.description:
“Tax” amount is crucial for middle-class-person(Salries and individual person) beacuse they can not escape from the “Tax Amount”. Business man can run away from the tax plainly. That cause is under.

Businessman shows all expensies under the company expenses and include personal expenses under the company hence, it’s quick way to escape from the paying tax at the end of financial year.

Here I mention some short and sweet way to save tax.

1. Tax Saving Individual using Charity (Donation)

2. Save Tax using Fix-Deposite (Tax Saver FDs)

3. Tax Save using Public Provident Fund

4. National Saving Certifcate (NSC)

5. Life Insurance Premium (LIC)

6. Home Loan Payment

7. Paying Health Insurance Premium
